name: the sound for 1 is 1
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "the sound for 1 is 1" do
    expected = "1"
    actual = convert 1
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: the sound for 3 is Pling
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "the sound for 3 is Pling" do
    expected = "Pling"
    actual = convert 3
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: the sound for 6 is Pling as it has a factor 3
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "the sound for 6 is Pling as it has a factor 3" do
    expected = "Pling"
    actual = convert 6
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: 2 to the power 3 does not make a raindrop sound as 3 is the exponent not the base
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "2 to the power 3 does not make a raindrop sound as 3 is the exponent not the base" do
    expected = "8"
    actual = convert 8
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual
